post.title: MyBatipse XML Generate ResultSet from JPA Annotations
post.description: My new company, Standardbred Canada, uses Mybatis to manage their Data Access.  After getting used to the environment I found I needed a better/faster way to write mapper files.  I was able to throw together a JPA backed mapping plugin for Eclipse.
post.excerpt:
